actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 relating to minimum rates, fares and charges for service provided by air carriers for contract services to the Department of Defense.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to direct the Civil Aeronautics Board to establish minimum rates, fares, and charges for air services provided to the Department of Defense by air carriers through contracts of more than 30 days' duration.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 relating to minimum rates, fares and charges for service provided by air carriers for contract services to the Department of Defense.
